plot: Fidel Cordero's La Fabulosa Historia de Diego Marin is a gentle fantasy about an illiterate 17th century shepherd who dreams of flying but has to contend with the fears and superstitions of the local yokels who are bent on preventing him from building a Leonardo Da Vinci style flying machine of his own invention.   Written by  Mike Hodges
title: La fabulosa historia de Diego Marín
plot_es: Fidel Cordero's La Fabulosa Historia de Diego Marin is a gentle fantasy about an illiterate 17th century shepherd who dreams of flying but has to contend with the fears and superstitions of the local yokels who are bent on preventing him from building a Leonardo Da Vinci style flying machine of his own invention.
